text: Be (Б, б) is the second letter in the Cyrillic alphabet. It came from the Greek beta, along with the Cyrillic veh. Its old name was buky. It stands for the Roman B. The uppercase Б looks like a B with the top curve missing and the lowercase one looks like the number 6. People say it as [b]. ==Related pages== * B * Beta (letter)
title: Be (Cyrillic)
